rangers_bow.name: Ranger's Bow
rangers_bow.description: A well-crafted hunting bow, worn smooth by years of use.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.description: Flexible protection made from treated animal hide.

survival_kit.name: Survival Kit
survival_kit.description: Contains basic tools for wilderness survival: rope, tinderbox, fishing hooks, and small knife.

healing_herbs.name: Healing Herbs
healing_herbs.description: A collection of medicinal plants that can restore minor wounds.

ceremonial_spear.name: Ceremonial Spear
ceremonial_spear.description: A spear blessed by the spirits, decorated with tribal markings.

spirit_totem.name: Spirit Totem
spirit_totem.description: A carved wooden totem that allows communication with ancestral spirits.

scholars_robes.name: Scholar's Robes
scholars_robes.description: Fine robes marking you as a student of the Great Library.

arcane_focus.name: Arcane Focus
arcane_focus.description: A crystal that helps channel magical energies.

steel_sword.name: Steel Longsword
steel_sword.description: A well-balanced blade of quality steel.

iron_shield.name: Iron Shield
iron_shield.description: A sturdy iron shield with reinforced edges.

chainmail.name: Chain Mail
chainmail.description: Armor made of interlocking metal rings.

health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: A red liquid that restores health when consumed.

mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
mana_potion.description: A blue liquid that restores magical energy.

rations.name: Travel Rations
rations.description: Dried meat and hardtack that can sustain you for a day.

scroll_fireball.name: Scroll of Fireball
scroll_fireball.description: A magical scroll containing the fireball spell.

silver_ring.name: Silver Ring
silver_ring.description: A simple silver band that gleams in the light.

iron_helmet.name: Iron Helmet
iron_helmet.description: A simple iron helmet that protects the head.

moonstone_amulet.name: Moonstone Amulet
moonstone_amulet.description: An amulet containing a fragment of moonstone that glows softly.

ancient_key.name: Ancient Bronze Key
ancient_key.description: An old bronze key with strange markings. It seems important.

gem_ruby.name: Ruby Gem
gem_ruby.description: A precious ruby that could be used in crafting or sold for coin.
